snippet: A Senate committee report urges the government to pay closer attention to safety and wage violations when awarding federal contracts.
abstract: Senate committee report criticizes federal government for awarding tens of billions of dollars in contracts to companies even though they were found to have violated safety and wage laws; urges government to pay closer attention to violations when awarding contracts.
lead_paragraph: A Senate committee report urges the government to pay closer attention to safety and wage violations when awarding federal contracts.

headline.main: Study Finds Federal Contracts Given to Flagrant Violators of Labor Laws
headline.print_headline: Study Finds Federal Contracts Given To Flagrant Violators of Labor Laws
